fixes.name: Sec MV USD T
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR vUseCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR vEndDate = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    vUseCustom = TRUE(),
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
        ABS('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Sec value USD]) / POWER(10, 6),
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = vEndDate,
        ABS('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Sec value USD]) / POWER(10, 6),
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the nested IF logic to DAX using VARs for parameter values. Parameter references were replaced with SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]) per rules. All column references were transformed to 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[ColumnName]. ABS division by 10^6 was implemented as ABS(...) / POWER(10, 6).
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a parameter, and all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
